description: ANT Test - Migrated to Layout & Response System

parameters.name: responsemode
parameters.description: Response method: auto (platform-aware), keyboardShift (L/R shift), keyboardSafe (Z/slash for web), mousetarget (click targets), mousebutton (L/R mouse buttons)

parameters.name: responselabels
parameters.description: Semantic labels for left and right responses

parameters.name: showfooter
parameters.description: [DEPRECATED - footer now managed by layout system] Show/hide footer

parameters.name: leftresponse
parameters.description: [DEPRECATED - use responsemode instead] Left response key. Kept for backward compatibility.

parameters.name: rightresponse
parameters.description: [DEPRECATED - use responsemode instead] Right response key. Kept for backward compatibility.

parameters.name: reps
parameters.description: Number of repetitions through the design (which is 4 cue conditions x 2 target locations x 2 target directions x 3 flanker conditions

parameters.name: showRT
parameters.description: Show/hide reaction time display in practice block (ShowRT <- 0 == hide / gShowRT <- 1 == show)

parameters.name: showNeutralFlankers
parameters.description: Show/hide neutral flankers (dashs in the neutral condition) (gShowNeutralFlankers <- 0 == hide / gShowNeutralFlankers <- 1 == show)
